abstract: The Blackstone Group, Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and the  Carlyle Group, three giants of the private equity world, are lining up to bid for the cellphone operations that Verizon Wireless is selling after its deal to buy Alltel, according to press reports.
lead_paragraph: The Blackstone Group, Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and the  Carlyle Group, three giants of the private equity world, are lining up to bid for the cellphone operations that Verizon Wireless is selling after its deal to buy Alltel, according to press reports.

headline.main: Buyout Giants Said to Bid for Verizon Assets
